LanguageData.Concrete.label: Concrete
LanguageData.Concrete.description: Quick-poured concrete in a flat, grey surface. You'll need to be able to dig out the ground to pour this. Beauty: 1.
LanguageData.DarkConcrete.label: Dark Concrete
LanguageData.DarkConcrete.description: Dark concrete in a honeycomb pattern. You'll need to be able to dig out the ground to pour this. Beauty: 1.
LanguageData.CeramicTile.label: Ceramic Tile
LanguageData.CeramicTile.description: Small white ceramic tiles with a dark bordering. Quick to move around on. Beauty: 3.
LanguageData.PavedTile.label: Paved Tile
LanguageData.PavedTile.description: Large grey tiles with a thick, dark border. Quick to move around on. Beauty: 2.
LanguageData.TileSandstone.label: Sandstone Tile
LanguageData.TileSandstone.description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling. Beauty: 2.
LanguageData.TileGranite.label: Granite Tile
LanguageData.TileGranite.description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling. Beauty: 2.
LanguageData.TileLimestone.label: Limestone Tile
LanguageData.TileLimestone.description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling. Beauty: 2.
LanguageData.TileSlate.label: Slate Tile

LanguageData.TileMarble.description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling. Beauty: 2.

LanguageData.ClayBrickTile.description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling. Beauty: 2.
LanguageData.TileCeramics.label: Ceramics Tile
LanguageData.TileCeramics.description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling. Beauty: 2.
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.label: sandstone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources. Beauty: 1.
LanguageData.FlagstoneGranite.label: granite flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneGranite.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources. Beauty: 1.

LanguageData.FlagstoneLimestone.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources. Beauty: 1.

LanguageData.FlagstoneSlate.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources. Beauty: 1.
LanguageData.FlagstoneMarble.label: marble flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneMarble.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources. Beauty: 1.
